DOC.brief_summary: In collaboration University Iowa , Palmer Center Chiropractic Research pilot study intend pursue follow specific aim : - Collect preliminary estimate variability effect size identify physiological measure predict patient-centered outcome patient chronic low back pain ; - Collect preliminary estimate variability effect size determine difference spinal manipulation delivery , estimate thrust contact force spinal segment load , relate patient-centered outcome patient chronic low back pain .
DOC.brief_title: Patient Response Spinal Manipulation - Pilot Study
DOC.detailed_description: In collaboration University Iowa , Palmer Center Chiropractic Research pilot study intend pursue follow specific aim : - Collect preliminary estimate variability effect size identify physiological measure predict patient-centered outcome patient chronic low back pain ; - Collect preliminary estimate variability effect size determine difference spinal manipulation delivery , estimate thrust contact force spinal segment load , relate patient-centered outcome patient chronic low back pain . The specific aim achieve conduct prospective observational study evaluate delivery HVLA-SM use subjective patient self-report objective biomechanical physiological measure . Participants narrowly define chronic low back pain include study . Each participant treat 12 time course 6 week . The following data collect : participant characteristic may predict outcome modifier force use provider ( gender , height , weight , BMI , duration chronic LBP , etc ) ; spinal joint load pre-load thrusting phase ( force moment pre-load phase , peak force moment load rate thrust phase ) ; physiological measure ( spinal stiffness flexion-relaxation ) ; patient report outcome back pain function ; concomitant medication treatment . This study identify association physiological participant self-report outcome test subsequent study . It may also identify potential spinal joint load variation SM delivery contribute clinical improvement could validate future study . Study participant ( n=80 ) recruit Quad Cities metro area . A team experience chiropractic clinician work PCCR treat study participant . Each study participant receive 2 HVLA-SM treatment visit per week 6 week period . The physiological assessment perform immediately SM deliver treatment visit 1 , 5 & 12 ( 6 set assessment total ) . During treatment visit , also capture kinetic measure SM deliver spinal joint load analysis . Participant self-report outcome measure baseline 1 , treatment visit 1 , 5 , 12 . After equipment modify , research clinician train familiarize new set-up . Following test refine data collection protocol pilot study five healthy volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Age 2165 Signed inform consent document Chronic ( 12+ week ) low back pain NRS > 2 phone screen baseline visit 1 baseline visit 2 Compliance concern refusal shave body hair No manipulable lesion L3 , L4 , L5 SI joint ( The absence typical palpatory characteristic well absence global assessment would indicate spinal manipulation likely generate positive therapeutic effect , even without presence standard palpatory finding ) Comorbid Conditions : Serious Contaminant Illness Inflammatory Destructive Spinal Tissue change Ankylosing Spondylitis Fibromyalgia Rheumatoid Arthritis Neuromuscular Disease ( e.g . Parkinson 's , Muscular Dystrophy , Cerebral Palsy , Myasthenia gravis ) Spinal Surgery < 6 mo Suspicion drug alcohol abuse Uncontrolled hypertension Peripheral Arterial Disease Undetermined , infectious visceral source LBP Other comorbid condition prohibit treatment and/or test Safety Concerns Bleeding Disorders Contraindications HVLASM Quebec Task Force ( QTF ) criterion 411 : QTF 4 : Pain + radiation upper/lower limb sign QTF 5 : Presumptive compression spinal nerve root simple roentgenogram QTF 6 : Compression spinal nerve root confirm specific image technique QTF 7 : Spinal Stenosis QTF 8 : Postsurgical status , 16 month intervention QTF 9 : Postsurgical status , > 6 month intervention QTF 10 : Chronic pain syndrome QTF 11 : Other diagnosis Pregnancy Pacemaker defibrillator Inability read verbally comprehend English Joint Replacement Sensitivity adhesive Additional diagnostic procedure xray necessary BDIII > 29 Retention legal advice open pending case relate LBP BMI > 40 Unwilling low back wrist shave Seeking receive compensation disability ?
